content: acorn wristlet pouch crochet pattern skill level beginner materials required ❖ crochet hook size 4 5mm ❖ beige yarn…… medium #4 worsted weight 40 - 50 yards 20g ❖ dark brown yarn…… medium #4 worsted weight 40 - 50 yards 20g ❖ yarn needle ❖ scissors ❖ stitch marker ❖ any yarn and color can be used for the oak leaves each leaf takes approximately 11 yards 5g 0 18oz if you use medium yarn different size yarns will make a different size leaf see photo example → the yarn i used and that s pictured is bernat super value acrylic yarn in colors heather brown & dark heather for the acorn 1 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved all documents and pictures are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole thank you for respecting copyright laws note this pattern was written for both the top and bottom of the acorn to be made with the same size thickness yarn if the yarn or hook size is dramatically different than the pattern indicates - the acorn top will not fit to the bottom as intended of course the acorn can be made with different yarn than the pattern as long as the top and bottom are made with the same size yarn the yarn amounts stated for this pattern only apply of you re using the same size yarn as the pattern the weight and amount of yarn necessary varies if you use different size yarn or hook and also depending on your gauge adjust your hook size for different yarn ❖ 3dc-cluster 4dc-cluster 2 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved all documents and pictures are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole thank you for respecting copyright laws abbreviations us terms r 1 …… row or round number ml…… magic loop or magic_ring single_crochet…… single_crochet 1 …… the number of stitches in the finished row or round half_double_crochet…… half-double_crochet double_crochet…… double_crochet bold lettering…… the stitches to do for that round treble_crochet…… treble_crochet blo…… back loops only the stitches between brackets → is the stitch or sequence of stitches to increase…… increase 2 stitches in one repeat the indicated amount of times space decrease…… decrease invisible decrease x1…… the necessary amount of times to repeat a sequence of stitches st…… stitch or stitches slip_stitch…… slip_stitch double_crochet-cluster… double_crochet cluster stitch yo insert hook into space yo draw up space…… space a loop yo and pull through 2 loops yo skip…… skip and repeat same steps into the same space until you have the necessary chain…… chain amount of unfinished double crochets yo…… yarn over on your hook 4 loops on the hook for 3dc-cluster 5 loops on the hook for 4dc- fasten_off…… cut the working yarn cluster then draw up a loop through all of and pull through the loop and pull tight
